title: WTC Fallout: Time to Rebuild
description: In this episode of Cricket Unfiltered, Menners and Damien Watson dive into Australia‚Äôs crushing defeat in the World Test Championship Final and ask the big question: is this team in decline? From Pat Cummins‚Äô pointed press conference to key selection headaches, they unpack the top-order woes, dissect Steve Smith‚Äôs injury risk, and debate who should open in the West Indies. There‚Äôs also big BBL news, including a blockbuster signing for the Sixers, plus a look at Major League Cricket and the Women‚Äôs World Cup schedule.
